body.p:
To His Excellency B MaGoffin
Gov of Ky Frankfort Ky
Dr Sir

Vacancys have occured in District No 8 in this Knox County Ky in the offices of Justices of the Peace in said District I therefore represent & recommend to you James Worm and John Bright as worthy honest and competent to fill said vacancys

There is a vacancy in District No in the office of Justice of the Peace I therefore represent and recommend to you O P Herndon as worthy honest and competent to fill said vacancy I hope you will issue
and forward to the above named gentlemen Commissions for the positions to which I recommend them respectively

Very Truly
W W Pope
Presiding Judge
of Knox County
March 1 1862
Barbourville Ky

Knox Co
J. P.
appd Mar 13. 1862
